hero.title: FinWave - Manage Your Finances!
hero.description: FinWave is a flexible open-source solution for finance management featuring automatic transactions, customizable currencies, multi-account management, and more. Your data is secure: deploy the application on your own infrastructure!

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: FinWave is an open-source application. This enhances security and builds trust.

webBased.title: Web-Based
webBased.description: Access from any device without the need for downloading and installation.

treeLikeCategories.title: Tree-Like Categories
treeLikeCategories.description: Categorize transactions as you prefer: create category hierarchies to easily track and analyze expenses.

deepAnalytics.title: Advanced Analytics
deepAnalytics.description: Analyze your expenses using any filter: from period to transaction descriptions.

automations.title: Automations
automations.description: Set up regular payments once and never miss a transaction again.

budgetPlanning.title: Budget Planning
budgetPlanning.description: Set expected expenses and incomes by categories for accurate budget planning.

exportCSV.title: Import/Export CSV Files
exportCSV.description: Quickly import or export your transactions for detailed analysis or storage.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLanguage.description: Manage your finances in the language you use daily.

aiAssistant.title: ChatGPT Support
aiAssistant.description: Powerful AI integration can help analyze expenses, create or modify categories, add transactions, and much more.
